Articles.Content:
Your mission, if you are bored enough to do

is to create a mothership space plane, and have at least 2 space planes that can land on it

Basicly create a super plane, and at least 2 other planes to land on it.

Make sure u actually have 3 planes loaded into the game. Use persistence in order to land each individual plane.

Create the mother ship with a medium size orbit 70-95km

Also a bonus challange is to create a second one in a Low Orbit/ in atmosphere (i assume its like 60km ish and less.)

Basicly NovaPunch, Nova SIDRI. C7 Flight pack & Experimental mod packs are allowed.

Edit: i forgot to say what parts you can use

2nd Edit: removed the low orbit challenge, due to prestince not working under those conditions.

Also a bonus challange is to create a second one in a Low Orbit/ in atmosphere (i assume its like 60km ish and less.)

impossible

sorry bro

There\'s been a few similar challenges, but this is really just a variant of docking. The only thing (that I know of) that can fly forever in the atmosphere is that drone... and even then, it\'s too fast and very hard to control I believe.

You mean something like this carrier?

It can fly in the atmosphere, too. But no docking is effective just yet. And you can\'t effectively land a plane on another plane in the air, I have tried, and it always ends bad.
